name: Qwikwire Corporation
description: Developer of an online international payment platform designed to manage property payments, association dues and others, invoicing and billing with an automated dashboard. The company's platform provides white-labeled invoicing and payment service to large enterprises for billing customers who are out of state or those who are temporarily working abroad which reduces reliance on intermediaries such as agents, brokers, or other marketing channels, enabling businesses to easily monitor all their transactions in real-time.
one_liner: Developer of an online international payment platform designed to manage property payments, association dues and others, invoicing and billing with an automated dashboard. The company's platform provides white-labeled invoicing and payment service to large enterprises for billing customers who are out of state or those who are temporarily working abroad which reduces reliance on intermediaries such as agents, brokers, or other marketing channels, enabling businesses to easily monitor all their transactions in real-time.
